page.title: 08EVERCREECH BUSINESSES.
page.content:
J&J JOINERY J&J Joinery was at the bottom of the school field.It is now at Leighton Lane trading estate.They only do small jobs rather than large jobs.They use a lot of modern equipment.If you go down to the trading estate you can hear the equipment running as it is so loud.
PETER GREEN HAULAGE Pete Green is a haulage contractor which is a person who hauls goods.He and his workers drive Fiat and Volvo lorries because they thought they would be the best.The company started in 1960 because he wanted a job.12 out of 24 of his workers live out of Evercreech.There is only one woman who works in the office.The lorries go all over the country.
